scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Crucifixion of Christ, with Christ in the center on the cross, flanked by two thieves on crosses. A crowd of onlookers, including soldiers in armor and civilians in various attire, are gathered below. Some figures are looking up at the crucifixion, while others appear to be in mourning. A woman in a blue robe, likely the Virgin Mary, kneels in sorrow. The setting is an outdoor landscape with rolling hills and a blue sky dotted with stars. The scene is framed by an ornate border with foliate motifs.
